body_html:
Sorry to bump an old thread.
I have made a post on building tensorflow on an online computer based on @truatpasteurdotfr's idea and I wanted to point to a solution.
This should work with any kind of configuration (it works at least with CUDA support).
body_text:
Sorry to bump an old thread.
I have made a post on building tensorflow on an online computer based on @truatpasteurdotfr's idea and I wanted to point to a solution.
This should work with any kind of configuration (it works at least with CUDA support).
body:
Sorry to bump an old thread.
I have made a [post on building tensorflow on an online computer](https://flanaras.wordpress.com/2018/03/16/build-tensorflow-on-an-offline-computer/) based on @truatpasteurdotfr's idea and I wanted to point to a solution.
This should work with any kind of configuration (it works at least with CUDA support).
